hero-slider-description: Светодиодная лампа нового поколения. Многофункциональная светодиодная лампа, экологически чистая и приятная для глаз.
name: Name
about-desc: Двадцатилетняя деятельность компании, опыт, квалифицированный персонал, высокое качество и широкий ассортимент позволяют удерживать позицию одного из лидеров на рынке Узбекистана.
about-desc-2: Для индивидуальных заказчиков - дизайн мебели и 3D визуализация. Для производителей мебели и дизайнеров мы предлагаем специальные условия.
where-worked: Where and in what position did you work
is-sick: Are there contagious, serious diseases? Disability group? There was a serious operation
advantages: What do you think you are good at or what your strengths are?
salary: What monthly salary do you expect?
about-2: Our activity began in 1997 with the sale of Paralon and soft furniture. In 2002, we continued this direction on a large scale, specializing in soft furniture.
about-3: In 2015, the Ardotex brand was founded and products that did not meet the low-cost requirements were completely abandoned. Currently, more than 1000 of our products are imported from Turkey, Poland, Russia and China.
about-4: Our Team: We pride ourselves on our team of experienced professionals in the field of furniture fabrics and mechanisms. Our experts constantly monitor the latest trends in the industry and strive to offer our customers relevant and high-quality products.
about-5: Product Quality: We maintain high quality standards and work with reliable product suppliers to ensure our customers receive products that meet their requirements. All of our fabrics and mechanisms are lab tested to ensure durability, reliability and functionality.
about-6: We understand that choosing furniture materials can be difficult. Therefore, we provide instructions and recommendations for the selection of suitable fabrics and mechanisms according to the needs and preferences of each customer. We also provide advice on how to use our products to ensure they last a long time and stay in perfect condition.
about-7: Our mission is 'Raising the position of local furniture makers and introducing them to the world'.
about-p-1-desc: The 'face' of any sofa, armchair or chair is its cover. With its help, you can give a certain style to interior items, make them more comfortable or give an exclusive look. In our store, you can buy more than 30 collections of national and modern styles, more than 500 colors and textures of fabrics for furniture upholstery, which will match any interior and give new life to your favorite sofa.
about-p-2-desc: Imagine that with the right choice of furniture, you can turn a sofa into a luxurious sleeping place or a place to relax thanks to a functional mechanism with a few simple actions. Furniture in the apartment should not be a souvenir, it should be used and bring comfort to every home, so it is very important to pay attention to the use of mechanisms. We are always happy to offer you a wide range of semi-finished and finished machinery.
about-p-3-desc: When buying furniture, we first evaluate its appearance. But buyers think less about how long it will last and how practical, functional and reliable the furniture will be, but this quality furniture is the key to the longevity of the products. With this in mind, we offer you a wide range of soft furniture decor, furniture legs, complementary products and accessories. We value our customers and strive to provide them with the best possible shopping experience. If you have any questions, our team is ready to help you make the right choice and provide the support you need. Thank you for visiting our site and we hope you find everything you need for Upholstered Furniture.
